original_text: Joshua took all these cities and he killed all their kings. He destroyed them all, as the Lord's servant Moses had told him to do.
korean_text: 여호수아가 그 왕들의 모든 성읍과 그 모든 왕을 붙잡아 칼날로 쳐서 진멸하여 바쳤으니 여호와의 종 모세가 명령한 것과 같이 하였으되

sentences.original_text: and he killed all their kings
as the Lord's servant Moses had told him to do
sentences.korean_translation: 주의 종 모세가 그에게 하라고 말한 대로입니다
